roleset.name: advanced, refined,
roleset.note: SOPHISTICATED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from sophisticated.01-j)

role.descr: aspect/domain of arg1 that is sophisticated (if in addition)

example.name: sophisticate-v
example.text: no elevation could have spoiled or sophisticated him

example.name: sophistication-n
example.text: In a way, they were stating the obvious: that the seemingly childlike simplicity of Klee's figurations resulted from a deliberate reduction which not only did not impair his sophistication of form, but actually enabled him to realize it.

example.name: sophisticated-j: arg1
example.text: That show was , for its time -LRB- 1962 - 68 -RRB- , sophisticated and realistic , compared to stuff like " The Man From U.N.C.L.E. " and " The Saint " which frequently bordered on the goofy .
example.arg: compared to stuff like " The Man From U.N.C.L.E. " and " The Saint " which frequently bordered on the goofy
